robloxapi-error-no-arguments: Error message shown when no arguments are provided to the #robloxAPI parser function
robloxapi-error-invalid-args-count: Error message shown when an invalid number of arguments is provided to a parser function
robloxapi-error-invalid-id: Error message shown when an invalid ID is provided to a parser function. $1 is the invalid ID
robloxapi-error-invalid-data: Error message shown when the API returns invalid data
robloxapi-error-decode-failure: Error message shown when the API response cannot be decoded
robloxapi-error-datasource-not-found: Error message shown when a data source is not found. $1 is the ID of the missing data source
robloxapi-error-unexpected-data-structur: Error message shown when the API returns an unexpected data structure
robloxapi-error-datasource-returned-no-d: Error message shown when a data source returns no data
robloxapi-error-user-group-not-found: Error message shown when the group data for a user cannot be found
robloxapi-error-request-failed: Error message shown when a request to the API fails
robloxapi-error-arg-not-allowed: Error message shown when an argument is not allowed for a specific type. $1 is the invalid argument and $2 is the type
robloxapi-error-invalid-thumbnail-size: Error message shown when an invalid thumbnail size is provided
robloxapi-error-invalid-username: Error message shown when an invalid username is provided
robloxapi-error-missing-argument: Error message shown when a required argument is missing. $1 is the type of argument that is missing
robloxapi-error-missing-optional-argumen: Error message shown when an optional argument is missing a value. The optional argument must be in the format 'key=value'
robloxapi-error-unknown-optional-argumen: Error message shown when an unknown optional argument is provided. $1 is the unknown argument's key
robloxapi-error-invalid-thumbnail-format: Error message shown when an invalid thumbnail format is provided. $1 is the invalid format. Possible values are 'Webp' and 'Png'
robloxapi-error-invalid-boolean: Error message shown when an invalid boolean value is provided. $1 is the invalid value. Must be 'true' or 'false'
robloxapi-error-invalid-return-policy: Error message shown when an invalid return policy is provided. $1 is the invalid policy. Must be 'PlaceHolder', 'ForcePlaceHolder', 'AutoGenerated', or 'ForceAutoGenerated'
robloxapi-error-too-many-required-args: Error message shown when too many required arguments are provided to a data source. $1 is the argument that exceeds the maximum number of required arguments
robloxapi-error-invalid-user-games-limit: Error message shown when an invalid limit is provided for the user games data source. $1 is the invalid limit. Must be 10, 25 or 50
robloxapi-error-invalid-sort-order: Error message shown when an invalid sort order is provided. $1 is the invalid sort order. Must be 'Asc' or 'Desc'
